page.title: 09School Games in Lostock 1
page.content:
At{Lostock County Primary School}a very popular game is one called{Foxey. There are always two people 'on'. (Perhaps you may have another 12 people who are not on). The two people who are on have to 'catch' all the other people.
The first person who is touched has to go and find someone else and when that person is touched he or she joins on with the person who touches them. Then they help the first two people to get the others.
It goes on like this until the last person is touched. Then the first two who were touched are on.
We play this game until the end of playtime.
